snippet: The collection of works by 23 artists at the Hudson Valley Center for Contemporary Art attempts to address the “core of our everyday lives.”
abstract: Martha Schwendener reviews exhibit Art at the Core: The Intersection of Visual Art, Performance and Technology at the Hudson Valley Center for Contemporary Art in Peekskill (Metropolitan/Westchester).
lead_paragraph: The collection of works by 23 artists at the Hudson Valley Center for Contemporary Art attempts to address the “core of our everyday lives.”

headline.seo: A Review of ‘Art at the Core’ at the Hudson Valley Center for Contemporary Art in Peekskill
headline.main: Everyday Existence, With Eyes Wide Open
headline.print_headline: Everyday Existence, With Eyes Wide Open
